snippet: Bank of America Corporation and Société Générale said the split of MBIA in 2009 defrauded policyholders, but a New York State Supreme Court justice said the approval of the split was rational.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Barbara R Kapnick dismisses lawsuit by Bank of America Corp and Societe Generale against MBIA challenging its 2009 restructuring; banks said split of MBIA defrauded policyholders, but justice says approval of split was rational.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Corporation and Société Générale said the split of MBIA in 2009 defrauded policyholders, but a New York State Supreme Court justice said the approval of the split was rational.

headline.seo: Banks’ Lawsuit Against MBIA Over Restructuring Is Dismissed
headline.main: Banks’ Suit Against MBIA Over Restructuring Is Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Banks’ Suit Against MBIA Over Restructuring Is Dismissed
